A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not only was this a bad Star Wars film\, it was bad sci-fi\, and basically a bad movie.  The writing was amateur at best.  Characters were bland\, almost no character growth beyond what we already had in Episode 7.  Numerous plot holes and continuity errors\, even within the same scene.  A script that was just a rehash of Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi.\n\nThe theme of the movie seemed to be\, \"Let the old things die.\"  Apparently that extends to the Star Wars franchise as well.  Just let it die\, because it is a god awful travesty if we keep encouraging Disney to make more garbage like this!
